alert.note: Alert for Allen; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Putnam, southeastern Paulding, eastern Van Wert and southwestern Allen Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 539 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Continental to near Delphos to near Spencerville In Allen County. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Delphos around 545 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ottoville, Kalida and Continental. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
